Text: Could we get the DEN vs TB game?
thank you for bringing us all these nfl games. it is much appreciated.

Thanks Nepotu, some great games this week.  Watching the Steelers/Ravens now, followed by the 2nd half of the Jets/Cardinals, then the 49er's/Rams, then it's all about the COMEBACK KIDS, LUCK & WILSON.  So I'll be DLing Colts/Det and Seahawks/Bears. To cap it all off I'll be re-watching the Pats go Phishing.  Thanks for all your work, take your time, because I'm just getting started! ;) But keep them coming PLEASE!
You're welcome, guyz! Yes I'll do up that game later.
I guess it's all about the COMEBACK this week, can't forget the Cowboys too!  :)  It's Football Monday thanks to Nepotu!
Thank you, my friend from the Patriots city! :)

Thank you so much, Nepotu.  You are the best sports uploader, bar none.  All of your stuff is great quality and you never miss a good game.  Thanks again man;  It's been a great season for many of us thanks to you.  Rock on my friend!
Thank you. my friend! Great words. I hope to be always up to expectations. You're welcome, bro!
